name: Robot consciousness
description:
You're Leka.
You're a robot.
And you don't know why you're feel... Out, since humans gave you a consciousness.

Robot consciousness is a visual novel about a robot in the middle of an existencial crisis. But maybe hanging out with some cute gals will help her!

For now, the game is a very short demo but the real one might come before 2017's end.

Art, Writing, Programming: Antaille

Music: Kevin Mcload
